import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import './details.css' import React from 'react' import useGetById from '../../custom-hooks/hooks-requests/useGetById'; export const Details = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const [book, setBook] = useGetById(id, []); console.log(book) return (

Details Book

{book.title}

Author: {book.author}

Genre: {book.Genre}

Rating: {book.rating}

Description: {book.description}

) }
